title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Calroust joins the Bowmont, we moved forward again until we halted beneath a steep knowe on the Kelsocleuch Burn, at no great distance from the place of meeting.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Thereupon I drew the whole party to the left into a path which strikes over the hills towards the Bowmont AVater, and when we came behind Mow Law I halted them for a space, sending two men to the top of the Law with instructions to look down the Bowmont valley.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: Thereupon I drew the whole party to the left into a path which strikes over the hills towards the Bowmont AVater, and when we came behind Mow Law I halted them for a space, sending two men to the top of the Law with instructions to look down the Bowmont valley.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: it seemed, about the sources of the Bowmont water.

title: The X jewel,
author: Moncreiff, Fred. Chas.
snippet: He thereupon took me to his lodging, where he showed me a plat or plan of the Middle March, whereon the valleys of the Bowmont and Kale water were displayed, flowing to the north from the Border, being parallel to each other and but a mile or two a])art.
